name: Happy Slappy
description:
Slappy Happy is a Comedy-based RPG, with a hero blessed with the ability to "Slap" all their problems out of the way.

Help save the Princess, and stop the famine that plagues the land!

....Or, you know... Make it worse. Your choice.

Approximately 45-60 minutes of playtime. 

Made in One Month for the IGMC 2017
